VisuBackView.Title: Back View
VisuBottomView.Title: Bottom View
VisuCleanSpaceEnv.Title: Pure White
VisuCleanSpaceEnv.LongHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow and has no mirror effect. This is the default ambience.
VisuDarkBlueEnv.Title: Blue Design
VisuDarkBlueEnv.LongHelp: This ambience provides a grid, a ground, a sky, a skyline and no shadow.
VisuDarkGreyEnv.Title: Dark Review
VisuDarkGreyEnv.LongHelp: This ambience contains a ground and has no mirror effect.
VisuFilterAxis.Title: Hide/Show Reference Axis
VisuFilterAxis.ShortHelp: Hides or shows the reference axis lines.
VisuFilterLines.Title: Hide/Show Lines
VisuFilterPoints.Title: Hide/Show Points
VisuFrontView.Title: Front View
VisuHideShow.Title: Hide/Show
VisuHideShow.ShortHelp: Hides or shows an object or a set of objects.
VisuIsoView.Title: Isometric View
VisuLeftView.Title: Left View
VisuMaterialMode.Title: Material Mode
VisuNoEnv.Title: Basic
VisuNoEnv.LongHelp: No ambience is defined (neutral environment) and the default visualization environment is retrieved.
VisuNoShadingEdges.Title: Wireframe
VisuNoShadingEdges.ShortHelp: Displays object's edges and lines only.
VisuOrthographicView.Title: Parallel
VisuOrthographicView.ShortHelp: Displays objects in a parallel view.
VisuPanView.Title: Pan
VisuPanView.ShortHelp: Moves the model's view horizontally and vertically.
VisuPanView.LongHelp: Click Pan, then drag in any direction.
VisuPerspectiveView.Title: Perspective
VisuPerspectiveView.ShortHelp: Displays objects in a perspective view.
VisuReframeView.Title: Reframe
VisuReframeView.ShortHelp: Fits the entire model in the 3D area.
VisuReframeView.LongHelp: The use of the viewer space is simultaneously maximized.
VisuRightView.Title: Right View
VisuRotateView.Title: Rotate
VisuRotateView.ShortHelp: Turns the model around the vertical axis or around the horizontal axis.
VisuRotateView.LongHelp: Click Rotate, then drag horizontally or vertically.
VisuShading.Title: Shading
VisuShading.ShortHelp: Shades the surfaces of the geometry.
VisuShading.LongHelp: Displays edges (including hidden and smooth ones), or the materials that have been applied.
VisuShadingIllustration.Title: Illustration
VisuShadingIllustration.ShortHelp: Applies a wireframe mode in which visible edges and object outlines are displayed.
VisuShadingEdges.Title: Shading with Edges
VisuShadingEdges.ShortHelp: Shades with edges, whether smooth or not.
VisuShadingEdgesHiddenEdges.Title: Shading with Edges and Hidden Edges
VisuShadingEdgesHiddenEdges.ShortHelp: Shades with all edges, hidden or not.
VisuShadingEdgesNoSmoothEdges.Title: Shading with Edges without Smooth Edges
VisuShadingEdgesNoSmoothEdges.ShortHelp: Shades with edges, except the smooth ones.
VisuShadingMaterial.Title: Shading with Material
VisuShadingMaterial.ShortHelp: Displays the material applied onto your object.
VisuShadingMaterialEdges.Title: Shading with Material and Edges
VisuShadingMaterialEdges.ShortHelp: Displays the material applied onto your object with edges.
VisuShinyEnv.Title: Dark Mirror
VisuShinyEnv.LongHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow and a mirror effect, and two light sources coincident with the neons which enables to cast shadows on the ground.
VisuTopView.Title: Top View
VisuV6Env.Title: White Review
VisuV6Env.LongHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow and a mirror effect.
VisuVisibleSpace.Title: Swap Visible Space
VisuVisibleSpace.ShortHelp: Displays objects transferred to the hidden space.
VisuVisibleSpace.LongHelp:
All the other elements are not displayed. The background color changes to identify this space.

Click again to switch back to the invisible space.
VisuZoomView.Title: Zoom In or Out
VisuZoomView.LongHelp: Drag up to zoom in, and drag down to zoom out.
VisuGrid.Title: Toggle Grid
VisuGrid.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the grid on the ground.
VisuToggleMirror.Title: Toggle Mirror
VisuToggleMirror.ShortHelp: Displays or hides reflections of geometry actors on the ground.
VisuToggleShadow.Title: Toggle Shadows
VisuToggleShadow.ShortHelp: Displays or hides shadows of geometry actors on the ground.
